00049     public function createWidget( $owner, $className, $properties = array() )
00050     {
00051         $className = Yii::import( $className, true );
00052 
00053         if ( isset( $this->widgets[$className] ) )
00054             $properties = ( array() === $properties ? $this->widgets[$className] : CMap::mergeArray( $this->widgets[$className], $properties ) );
00055 
00056         if ( $this->enableSkin )
00057         {
00058             if ( null === $this->skinnableWidgets || in_array( $className, $this->skinnableWidgets ) )
00059             {
00060                 $_skinName = CPSHelperBase::o( $properties, 'skin', 'default' );
00061 
00062                 if ( false !== $_skinName && array() !== ( $_skin = $this->getSkin( $className, $_skinName ) ) )
00063                     $properties = ( array() === $properties ? $_skin : CMap::mergeArray( $_skin, $properties ) );
00064             }
00065         }
00066 
00067         //  Create our widget, pass in properties as well
00068         $_widget = new $className( $owner, $properties );
00069 
00070         //  Configure
00071         foreach ( $properties as $_key => $_value )
00072             $_widget->{$_key} = $_value;
00073 
00074         //  Return!
00075         return $_widget;
00076     }
